00028 #ifndef __ShadowCaster_H__
00029 #define __ShadowCaster_H__

00035 namespace Ogre {
00036 
00037 
00052     class _OgreExport ShadowRenderable : public Renderable, public ShadowDataAlloc
00053     {
00054     protected:
00055         MaterialPtr mMaterial;
00056         RenderOperation mRenderOp;
00057         ShadowRenderable* mLightCap; // used only if isLightCapSeparate == true
00058     public:
00059         ShadowRenderable() : mMaterial(), mLightCap(0) {}
00060         virtual ~ShadowRenderable() { delete mLightCap; }
00064         void setMaterial(const MaterialPtr& mat) { mMaterial = mat; }
00066         const MaterialPtr& getMaterial(void) const { return mMaterial; }
00068         void getRenderOperation(RenderOperation& op) { op = mRenderOp; }
00070         RenderOperation* getRenderOperationForUpdate(void) {return &mRenderOp;}
00072         void getWorldTransforms(Matrix4* xform) const = 0;
00074         Real getSquaredViewDepth(const Camera*) const{ return 0; /* not used */}
00076         const LightList& getLights(void) const;
00087         bool isLightCapSeparate(void) const { return mLightCap != 0; }
00088 
00090         ShadowRenderable* getLightCapRenderable(void) { return mLightCap; }
00092         virtual bool isVisible(void) const { return true; }
00093 
00099         virtual void rebindIndexBuffer(const HardwareIndexBufferSharedPtr& indexBuffer) = 0;
00100 
00101     };
00102 
00104     enum ShadowRenderableFlags
00105     {
00107         SRF_INCLUDE_LIGHT_CAP = 0x00000001,
00109         SRF_INCLUDE_DARK_CAP  = 0x00000002,
00111         SRF_EXTRUDE_TO_INFINITY  = 0x00000004
00112     };
00113 
00116     class _OgreExport ShadowCaster
00117     {
00118     public:
00119         virtual ~ShadowCaster() { }
00121         virtual bool getCastShadows(void) const = 0;
00122 
00124         virtual EdgeData* getEdgeList(void) = 0;
00126         virtual bool hasEdgeList(void) = 0;
00127 
00129         virtual const AxisAlignedBox& getWorldBoundingBox(bool derive = false) const = 0;
00131         virtual const AxisAlignedBox& getLightCapBounds(void) const = 0;
00133         virtual const AxisAlignedBox& getDarkCapBounds(const Light& light, Real dirLightExtrusionDist) const = 0;
00134 
00135         typedef vector<ShadowRenderable*>::type ShadowRenderableList;
00136         typedef VectorIterator<ShadowRenderableList> ShadowRenderableListIterator;
00137 
00153         virtual ShadowRenderableListIterator getShadowVolumeRenderableIterator(
00154             ShadowTechnique shadowTechnique, const Light* light, 
00155             HardwareIndexBufferSharedPtr* indexBuffer, 
00156             bool extrudeVertices, Real extrusionDistance, unsigned long flags = 0 ) = 0;
00157 
00177         static void extrudeVertices(const HardwareVertexBufferSharedPtr& vertexBuffer, 
00178             size_t originalVertexCount, const Vector4& lightPos, Real extrudeDist);
00180         virtual Real getPointExtrusionDistance(const Light* l) const = 0;
00181     protected:
00183         Real getExtrusionDistance(const Vector3& objectPos, const Light* light) const;
00191         virtual void updateEdgeListLightFacing(EdgeData* edgeData, 
00192             const Vector4& lightPos);
00193 
00207         virtual void generateShadowVolume(EdgeData* edgeData, 
00208             const HardwareIndexBufferSharedPtr& indexBuffer, const Light* light,
00209             ShadowRenderableList& shadowRenderables, unsigned long flags);
00216         virtual void extrudeBounds(AxisAlignedBox& box, const Vector4& lightPos, 
00217             Real extrudeDist) const;
00218 
00219 
00220     };
